usage.cn: 彼此相爱就是幸福。如此简单，如此难。
usage.eng: Love one another and you will be happy. It's as simple and as difficult as that.

usage.cn: 伤害他人然后说“对不起”是一件很容易的事，然而，受伤害后说“我没事”却是一件很难的事。
usage.eng: It's very easy to hurt someone and then say "sorry",but it's really very difficult to get hurt ans say "I'm fine".

usage.cn: 放弃其实并不比坚持容易多少，只是比较方便而已。坚持其实并不比放弃困难多少，只是懒得改变而已。
usage.eng: Give up actually is not how much, just than insist on easy easier just. Insist on actually not difficult than give up how much, is just too lazy to change it.
